description.value:
At 2nd level, you gain the ability to harness constellationsâ€™ power to alter your form. As a bonus action, you can expend a use of your @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.jXMI4Iy8McDpVl5y]{Wild Shape} feature to take on a starry form, rather than transforming into a beast.

While in your starry form, you retain your game statistics, but your body becomes luminous; your joints glimmer like stars, and glowing lines connect them as on a star chart. This form sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The form lasts for 10 minutes. It ends early if you dismiss it (no action required), are incapacitated, die, or use this feature again.

Whenever you assume your starry form, choose which of the following constellations glimmers on your body; your choice gives you certain benefits while in the form:

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.tHlQ8P9zZ2u1in8p]{Archer} - You gain a ranged spell attack.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.WGmFayc0xaJQKiPx]{Chalice} - Your healing spells provide additional healing.

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.b4nfLCB4VVqkhnUN]{Dragon} - You gain a bonus to checks to maintain Concentration.
